name: data-act-broker-backend
description: The DATA Act broker backend is a collection of services that power the DATA Act's central data submission platform. To increase access to and use of federal financial data in order to strengthen government-wide decision-making and accountability through data transparency, the broker relies on hundreds of distinct data elements to tell the story of how federal dollars are spent.
